title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: NPS Centennial
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     NPS Centennial            NPS Centennial          Â    Join us at the Monument this August 2016 to celebrate the 100th year of the National Park Service!  The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks. You can also share your national park story at FindYourPark.com. Share Your Photos  As the saying goes when you visit a park, it's best to "take only pictures and leave only footprints." You are part-owner of America's most awe-inspiring public lands and we want to see these places through your eyes. Share your photos and stories by December 31, 2016 for a chance to win $10,000! A Call To Action A Call to Action remains the foundation for our 2016 centennial preparations. It is the National Park Service's blueprint for the future, outlining the innovative work we want to accomplish. WWII Valor in the Pacific National Monument is a big part of this effort.  Experiences Find out what kinds of experiences you can have at parks all over America. To find national park experiences, visit the experiences search.
